Test Name: Complement C3 and C4 with Anti-C1Q Antibodies, Serum
Purpose: To accurately measure complement C3, C4, and anti-C1Q antibody levels for diagnosis and management of disorders involving the complement system (e.g., autoimmune diseases such as SLE).
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Clinical chemistry analyzer/ELISA platform, refrigerated centrifuge, micropipettes, vortex mixer, plate reader
